Summary: it was fast small and in a straight path
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in San Bernardino
There were no other sightings in San Bernardino on or around May 12th 2012
divs: Sighting Details My cousin had come over to hang out and when he was leaving he pointed to the sky and it was only for 10 seconds or less and i saw it move straight across the sky. when i looked it stopped for about 2 seconds the took off in the north direction of the sky. it looked like it was heading straight for a planet.
